title: Provider Tier Configuration
description: Defines model tier ladders for automatic escalation based on thinking budget (0.0-1.0)

provider.description: Provider identifier (anthropic, openai, google, xai, groq, etc.)

high.description: Model for thinking budget 0.65-1.0. Null falls back to cfg.model.

low.description: Budget threshold below which low tier is used (default: 0.25)

mid.description: Budget threshold below which mid tier is used (default: 0.65)

notes.description: Optional usage notes or special behavior
